com.eis.greenenergy.help

Class ConnectionDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eis.greenenergy.help.ConnectionDetector

  • public class ConnectionDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Auxiliary class to check if the user's internet connection is available.
    This class simplifies to conduct this check in several different views.
    Since:
    2014-05-30
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Veronika Henk, Sarvenaz Golchin, Mahnaz Hajibaba

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Context _context
      Context of the activity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionDetector(Context context)
      The context of the calling activity is assigned to the class variable _context.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isConnectingToInternet()
      Returns a boolean value indicating of the device is connected to the internet.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • _context

        private Context _context
        Context of the activity. In other words global information about the activity environment are stored in this object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionDetector

        public ConnectionDetector(Context context)
        The context of the calling activity is assigned to the class variable _context.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the activity creating an instance of ConnectionDetector.

    • Method Detail

      • isConnectingToInternet

        public boolean isConnectingToInternet()
        Returns a boolean value indicating of the device is connected to the internet.
        To do so this function checks for all possible internet providers.
        Returns:
        true if the connection to a network was detected;
        false otherwise.
